section.simpara: Scans through Zap channels for eavesdropping.
Enables a call center manager to monitor Zap channels quickly and conveniently. Press "#" to switch to the next channel or "*" to exit. You may limit the available channels by specifying group.

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

-= Info about application 'ZapScan' =-
[Synopsis] Scan Zap channels to monitor calls
[Description] ZapScan([group]) allows a call center manager to monitor Zap channels in a convenient way. Use '#' to select the next channel and use '*' to exit Limit scanning to a channel GROUP by setting the option group argument.
